name: Controller Training (for beginners :) )
description:
Some cool educational game about executing series of inputs!

It will try to teach you how to efficiently memorize and use your controller's mapping... :)

Additional info

  • Game supports Xbox and Playstation controllers, but input names are taken from the Xbox.
  • the concept is thought for local multiplayer, but we had a severe bug on the last day of the jam. It forced us to keep only the solo mode to deliver it at time. We'll put out the multiplayer udpate next week!
